title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds (Dwt: 4.36 carats
675 stones). Features two vibrant Emeralds (Eme: 3.28 carats)
and four lustrous South Sea Pearls (Moti: 12.90 carats). Showcases the refined Hyderabadi polish for enduring brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate floral design, meticulously crafted with shimmering diamonds. The centerpiece includes two stunning pear-shaped Emeralds, embraced by intricate diamond-studded filigree work. Dangling from the lower Emerald are four perfectly round South Sea Pearls, adding a touch of classic elegance. The necklace incorporates a flexible link design for comfortable wear.
colors: The color palette is a harmonious blend of the warm golden hue of the gold setting
the dazzling brilliance of the diamonds
the rich green of the Emeralds
and the creamy white of the South Sea Pearls. This classic combination is perfect for any occasion.
occasions: and important family gatherings. Perfect to adorn during a Muhurtham
or any festive occasion. It can also be styled with modern outfits for a touch of regal elegance.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance, blending traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The exceptional craftsmanship, combined with the high-quality diamonds, emeralds, and South Sea pearls, makes it a valuable investment.
